content.text: Match ends, Atlético de Madrid 2, Hércules 1.
Second Half ends, Atlético de Madrid 2, Hércules 1.
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Alberto Noguera replaces Reyes.
Juanra (Hércules) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Juanra (Hércules).
Reyes (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Sergio Agüero (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Reyes following a fast break.
Offside, Atlético de Madrid. Reyes tries a through ball, but Sergio Agüero is caught offside.
Foul by Paulo Assunção (Atlético de Madrid).
Javier Portillo (Hércules) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Corner,  Hércules. Conceded by Paulo Assunção.
Noé Pamarot (Hércules) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Jorge Pulido (Atlético de Madrid).
Corner,  Hércules. Conceded by Jorge Pulido.
Kiko Femenía (Hércules) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Mario Suárez (Atlético de Madrid).
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Elías replaces Koke.
Attempt missed. Matías Fritzler (Hércules) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Substitution, Hércules. Matías Fritzler replaces Farinós.
Attempt missed. Sergio Agüero (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Juan Valera.
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Paulo Assunção replaces Tiago.
Attempt blocked. David Cortés (Hércules) header from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Peña with a cross.
Abraham Paz (Hércules) is shown the yellow card.
Offside, Atlético de Madrid. Reyes tries a through ball, but Juanfran is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Tiago Gomes (Hércules) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Javier Portillo.
Attempt missed. Koke (Atlético de Madrid) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Reyes with a cross.
Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 2, Hércules 1. Reyes (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal.
Attempt saved. Sergio Agüero (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Reyes with a through ball.

Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 1, Hércules 1. David Trezeguet (Hércules) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Juanra with a headed pass following a corner.
Corner,  Hércules. Conceded by Filipe Luis.
Offside, Hércules. Farinós tries a through ball, but Javier Portillo is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Reyes (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Sergio Agüero.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Abraham Paz (Hércules) because of an injury.
Javier Portillo (Hércules) hits the bar with a left footed shot from outside the box from a direct free kick.
Foul by Tiago (Atlético de Madrid).
Kiko Femenía (Hércules) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Corner,  Hércules. Conceded by Koke.
Attempt blocked. David Cortés (Hércules) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by David Trezeguet.
Attempt missed. Sergio Agüero (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Juan Valera with a cross following a fast break.
Attempt blocked. Sergio Agüero (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Tiago (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Tiago Gomes (Hércules).
Reyes (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Noé Pamarot (Hércules).

Foul by Tiago (Atlético de Madrid).
Kiko Femenía (Hércules) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Second Half begins Atlético de Madrid 1, Hércules 0.
First Half ends, Atlético de Madrid 1, Hércules 0.
Attempt missed. Mario Suárez (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left following a fast break.

Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 1, Hércules 0. Álvaro Domínguez (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal following a corner.
